mn23:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn23:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo andhavane viharati.
mn23:1.4_0: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ andhavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā kumārakassapo tenupasaṅkami;
mn23:1.4_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṁ kumārakassapaṁ etadavoca:
mn23:2.1_0: “Bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṁ vammiko rattiṁ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:2.4_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa laṅgiṁ
mn23:2.9_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa uddhumāyikaṁ.
mn23:2.14_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa dvidhāpathaṁ.
mn23:2.19_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa caṅgavāraṁ.
mn23:2.24_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa kummaṁ.
mn23:2.29_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa asisūnaṁ.
mn23:2.34_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa maṁsapesiṁ.
mn23:2.39_0: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa nāgaṁ.
mn23:2.42_0: ‘tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṁ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassā’ti.
mn23:2.43_0: Ime kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, pañhe bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyāsi, yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṁ dhāreyyāsi.
mn23:2.44_0: Nāhaṁ taṁ, bhikkhu, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo imesaṁ pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheyya aññatra tathāgatena vā, tathāgatasāvakena vā, ito vā pana sutvā”ti—
mn23:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā kumārakassapo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn23:3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn23:3.2_0: “imaṁ, bhante, rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ andhavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
mn23:3.2_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho, bhante, sā devatā maṁ etadavoca:
mn23:3.3_0: ‘bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṁ vammiko rattiṁ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:3.10_0: Ko nu kho, bhante, vammiko, kā rattiṁ dhūmāyanā, kā divā pajjalanā, ko brāhmaṇo, ko sumedho, kiṁ satthaṁ, kiṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ, kā laṅgī, kā uddhumāyikā, ko dvidhāpatho, kiṁ caṅgavāraṁ, ko kummo, kā asisūnā, kā maṁsapesi, ko nāgo”ti?
mn23:4.1_0: “‘Vammiko’ti kho, bhikkhu, imassetaṁ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṁ, mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṁsanadhammassa.
mn23:4.2_0: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, divā kammante ārabbha rattiṁ anuvitakketi anuvicāreti—
mn23:4.4_0: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, rattiṁ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojeti kāyena vācāya ‘manasā’—
mn23:4.6_0: ‘Brāhmaṇo’ti kho, bhikkhu, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
mn23:4.12_0: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.15_0: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.18_0: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.19_0: ‘Caṅgavāran’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṁ nīvaraṇānaṁ adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn23:4.22_0: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.23_0: ‘Kummo’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn23:4.26_0: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.28_0: cakkhuviññeyyānaṁ rūpānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ piyarūpānaṁ kāmūpasaṁhitānaṁ rajanīyānaṁ,
mn23:4.32_0: kāyaviññeyyānaṁ phoṭṭhabbānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ piyarūpānaṁ kāmūpasaṁhitānaṁ rajanīyānaṁ.
mn23:4.34_0: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.37_0: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
mn23:4.39_0: Tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṁ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassāti ayametassa attho”ti.
mn23:4.41_0: Attamano āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
